question: You work for an international company and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.Write a letter to your manager.In your letter:explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six monthssay how your work could be done while you are awayask for his/her help in arranging it
text: I am writing this letter to express my interest in working at of our company’s headquarter in Toronto for a few months.

As you are aware, I have recently been promoted to  sales director. Honestly, I am working hard to collaborate with my team and enhance sales, but I am afraid that I do not have enough experience to lead the whole sales department. I do remember that there is a management course in our headquarters in Canada that is specially designed for new leaders. I am quite positive that this six-month training will help me to upgrade my managerial skills.
During my absence, I will keep in touch with my assistant Anna by phone and corporate email. Before I wrote to you I had already informed her, and she agreed to substitute for me.
Finally, I would need your support to get approval, so that I can be enrolled on this six-month management course.
I look forward to hearing from you.
